channel.title: RunServer.bat problem =/
channel.description:
Ok, so like I wanted to get back into the whole "having your own server business" but like, every time I try to run my server it just opens the CMD and closes it to fast to the point where i can't read the text in the CMD, so.. basically I can't run my server. :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: :| ;D Oh, and I also need a recommendation for a good source to run, I was thinking about hommiescape but maybe not because i always do that one. :) BTW here is my Runserver.bat code
@echo off color 0a title ReapageScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
Also, when i try to download JDK it doesn't let me. :(

item.title: RunServer.bat problem =/
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

ugh, now i got a new problem, when i try to download JDK it doesn’t let me because it says it already exists but when i try to replace it, it doesn’t work, but, the weird thing is, is that I DO NOT HAVE JDK!!! This has been pissing me off for a long time.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2009, 02:08:30 pm[/size][hr] ;D NO HELP NEEDED ANY MORE ;D

Read full topic

What do i do now?

item.title: RunServer.bat problem =/
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Add pause to the end of the batch file. Then try Googling environment variables. (Not being a dick; do it)

item.title: RunServer.bat problem =/
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

Ok, so like I wanted to get back into the whole “having your own server business” but like, every time I try to run my server it just opens the CMD and closes it to fast to the point where i can’t read the text in the CMD, so… basically I can’t run my server. :mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D

Oh, and I also need a recommendation for a good source to run, I was thinking about hommiescape but maybe not because i always do that one.

BTW here is my Runserver.bat code

@echo off color 0a title ReapageScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Also, when i try to download JDK it doesn’t let me.
